Package com.mazhar.android.notepad

Class Summary
AndroidDrivePad Defines a contract between the Note Pad content provider and its clients.
AndroidDrivePad.Notes Notes table contract
BuildConfig  
DriveSyncAdapter SymcAdapter that will keep NotePad notes on the device in sync on Google Drive.
DriveSyncer Holds logic for performing sync from Google Drive to the database using the provided user's credentials.
DriveSyncService Service for the DriveSyncAdapter.
NoteEditor This Activity handles "editing" a note, where editing is responding to Intent#ACTION_VIEW (request to view data), edit a note Intent#ACTION_EDIT, create a note Intent#ACTION_INSERT, or create a new note from the current contents of the clipboard Intent#ACTION_PASTE.
NoteEditor.LinedEditText Defines a custom EditText View that draws lines between each line of text that is displayed.
NotePad Defines a contract between the Note Pad content provider and its clients.
NotePad.Notes Notes table contract
NotePadProvider Provides access to a database of notes.
NotePadProvider.DatabaseHelper This class helps open, create, and upgrade the database file.
NotesList Displays a list of notes.
Preferences  
Preferences.PreferencesFragment This fragment shows the preferences for the main header.
R  
R.array  
R.attr  
R.drawable  
R.id  
R.layout  
R.menu  
R.string  
R.xml  
TitleEditor This Activity allows the user to edit a note's title.
